name: BORK
description:
Bork is a 2D/3D platformer that has the intent to not work like the rest of them. I want to make this a 2D sidescroller with 3D elements that you as a player control.

KNOWN BUGS

  • The ranking list does not show player ranking on Itch.io WebGL implementation
    • WebGL builds hosted at itch.io and other services as well as some versions of Android would need SSL to work! Need to get money to purchase that as a service
      • Fixed & Implemented a proper solution, the TOP 25 GLOBAL LIST IS NOW A GO
  • The player will glitch, warp etc around heavily
    • Not anymore! Nothing is happening on FixedUpdate anymore so that helps.

Pressing QUIT GAME will crash the webGL game. Who would've known?

  • Not all browsers are created equal. This game works best on:
    • Opera GX
    • Microsoft Edge

CONTROLS

  • Keyboard
    • Left & Right or A&D = Move character
    • Space = Jump
    • Mouse 1 or number 1 = Scale stuff away and other stuff in
    • Mouse 2 or number 2 = Scale other stuff away and stuff in
  • Controller
    • Stick or pad = Move character
    • A on Xbox & X on playstation = Jump
    • LB or L1 = Scale stuff away and other stuff in
    • RB or R1 = Scale other stuff away and stuff in
